name: Oneâ€‘Click Run Dev
updateContentCommand: bash -lc 'if [ -f pnpm-lock.yaml ]; then corepack enable && pnpm i; elif [ -f yarn.lock ]; then corepack enable && yarn install --frozen-lockfile; elif [ -f package-lock.json ]; then npm ci; else npm i; fi'
postStartCommand: bash -lc 'if [ -f package.json ]; then if jq -e .scripts.dev package.json >/dev/null 2>&1; then npm run dev -- --host 0.0.0.0; elif jq -e .scripts.start package.json >/dev/null 2>&1; then npm start; else echo "No dev/start script found in package.json"; fi; fi'
